feature.name: daily wage calculator
feature.description: Operational reality summary for "daily wage calculator" based on Jira evidence: - Findings / issues / limitations: 1 - Troubleshooting / edge cases / requests: 1

findings.group_description: Daily wage calculator supports multiple calculation methods for determining daily pay rate
findings.issue_explanation: Users can select different bases for calculating daily wage: calendar days, working days, or custom days

troubleshooting.group_description: When changing calculation basis, users might need to reset existing prorated salary transactions
troubleshooting.workaround_or_resolution: Reject and resave prorated salary transactions after changing calculation settings

glossary.definition: Method used to determine daily wage, including calendar days, working days, or custom days
Elements of salary that can be included in daily wage calculation, such as basic salary or basic plus allowances
